name: THINKSCALE 88lb Shipping Scale, 0.1oz Precision, Digital Postal Scale with Large LCD, Hold/Tare/Piece Counting, 5 Units, Dual Power (Battery/AC), Black
short_description: High Capacity & Precision: Accurately weighs items starts from 2g up to 88 lb (40 kg) with precise readings down to 0.1 oz/1g. Perfect for light items-letters to large heavy packages so that you can avoid excessive postage expenses.

5 Units & Clear Display: This mail scale features 5 versatile units (lb, lb:oz, oz, g, kg) for effortless switching between common shipping and postal weights. Its extra-large LCD display ensures easy reading of weight values in any setting

Smart Features & Simple Operation: Master shipping fast! Just 4 buttons: Tare (zero boxes/mailers instantly for exact postage), Hold (lock weights on wobbly packages), PCS (count envelopes/parts fast). Smart postage scale, super simple.

Durable One-Piece Design: This digital shipping postal scale boasts a solid platform made of tough black ABS plastic, reinforced internally with aluminum and iron for reliable, everyday use. Ships complete with AC adapter, 2 AA batteries, and soft ruler—toss the box and start weighing accurately in seconds.
Worry-Free Support: Enjoy a 2-Year Warranty + Lifetime Help. Ship with confidence. THINKSCALE is dedicated to 100% customer satisfaction! Our support team is ready with expert answers.

short_description: Higher Accuracy: With a high capacity of 66lb/30kg, the versatile shipping scale responds sensitively to every 0.1oz increase, suitable for measuring weights from items like envelopes to large packages

short_description: ACCURATE WEIGHING: With a maximum capacity of 110 lb, a starting weight as low as 10 g, and 0.1oz/2 g accuracy, this postal scale is versatile enough to handle both light and heavy packages, ensuring reliable measurements for your shipping and postal requirements.

MULTIPLE UNITS: Switch effortlessly between 5 units (lb, lb, oz, kg, g) to suit your specific shipping preferences. Whether you’re weighing in ounces for small packages or kilograms for bulkier items, this scale has you covered.

FLEXIBLE POWER OPTIONS: Powered by 2 AAA batteries or the included AC/DC adapter, this scale offers flexibility for both portable and stationary use, so you never have to worry about running out of power when weighing critical shipments.
